content.raw:
When encountering another problem with conflicting groups in runmanager (I will write an extra Issue), an error was raised in the function "preparse_globals_loop" as there is still a zprocess.raise_exception_in_thread-function used in it but, if I am correct, zprocess is no longer imported.
I also found zprocess being used in "load_configuration" and "compile_loop".
Probably this function can just be added to ls_zprocess?
content.html: When encountering another problem with conflicting groups in runmanager (I will write an extra Issue), an error was raised in the function "preparse_globals_loop" as there is still a zprocess.raise_exception_in_thread-function used in it but, if I am correct, zprocess is no longer imported. I also found zprocess being used in "load_configuration" and "compile_loop". Probably this function can just be added to ls_zprocess?
